TopicTitle: Bored In Physics Class, Drew Mercury Capsule

Articles.Content:
The title says most of it. However, there is a girl in my school who claims that anime characters look better than rockets. I have set out to prove her wrong. (She’s really good at drawing anime characters, unlike me ) I’m sure that I didn’t get all of the proportions right, but I tried really hard and isn’t that what matters in the U.S.A?

(in order to avoid angry comments, if anyone even sees this that last part was a joke)

https://m.imgur.com/a/BdJBV7u

Really good. 

Just make it a cutaway diagram and then let her draw an anime character in the seat. 

Bonus!!!
